Class BillingStaffView

java.lang.Object
CSC540.WolfWR.views.BillingStaffView
@Component public class BillingStaffView extends Object
This class provides the billing staff view functionality for interacting with the system. It allows the billing staff to generate bills for suppliers, calculate membership rewards for members, and display relevant transaction and product information.

The view utilizes services like TransactionService, MerchandiseService, MemberService, and SupplierService to handle the business logic for the different actions available to the billing staff.

  • Constructor Details

    • BillingStaffView

      public BillingStaffView()

  • Method Details

    • view

      public void view(Scanner scan)
      Displays the billing staff options and processes the user's choice. The user can select an action to generate bills for suppliers or calculate membership rewards.
      Parameters:
      scan - The Scanner object used to take user input.

    • generateBill

      public void generateBill(Scanner scan)
      Prompts the user to generate a bill for a supplier by selecting a supplier and a time frame. Displays the list of deliveries during the selected period and calculates the total payment for the supplier.
      Parameters:
      scan - The Scanner object used to take user input.

    • tabulateRewards

      public void tabulateRewards(Scanner scan)
      Prompts the user to calculate the membership rewards for a specific member during a defined period. Displays the total purchases made by the member and calculates the rewards based on the specified percentage.
      Parameters:
      scan - The Scanner object used to take user input.

    • showDeliveries

      public double showDeliveries(List<Merchandise> deliveries)
      Displays the deliveries for a given supplier, showing the product name, buy price, quantity, and total price.
      Parameters:
      deliveries - The list of Merchandise delivered during the selected period.
      Returns:
      The grand total of all the deliveries.
